downloadTitle: Certification Test Tool for Azure Certified
downloadDescription: Download the Microsoft Certification Test Tool for Azure Certified Virtual Machines

downloadFile.name: Certification Test Tool 1.6 for Azure Certified.msi

detailsSection:
The Microsoft Certification Test Tool for Azure Certified is designed to provide an assessment of compliance to technical requirements as part of the Azure Certified program. 

The test tool includes a wizard style automated section and questionnaire section to assess characteristics of a Virtual Machine image running in Microsoft Azure and generate results logs.

More information on the Azure Certified program is available at: http://www.azure.com/certified
detailsSection_file_name: Certification Test Tool 1.6 for Azure Certified.msi
systemRequirementsSection: Windows 8, Windows Server 2012 R2, Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine
installInstructionSection: Install the test tool on a Windows OS machine.  Run the test tool and specify the Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine to validate.
